name: ElectroWave (Drasibaoh, Ask_RNG, Chapca, Invidea)
description: Electro Wave is a second year bachelor students' Rythm Game project.  In the game you play Scott, a young musician who aspires to earn the title of "The Musician God". To do that, he travels to the "One More Time", a festival  held on Mars every 50 years, where he will confront the best musicians in the galaxy.
